title: This Chinese city found a Covid cluster. All 13 million residents are now under lockdown
content:
1. This Chinese city found a Covid cluster. All 13 million residents are now under lockdown  CNN
  2. Major Chinese city locks down to control Covid outbreak  CNBC
  3. China orders lockdown of up to 13 million people in Xi'an  Yahoo News
  4. China puts 13 million residents in lockdown ahead of Games  WJHL-TV News Channel 11
  5. Xi'an: Chinese city under lockdown as Covid cases rise  BBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: この中国の都市は、Covidクラスターを発見した。1300万人の全住民が封鎖された
这个中国城市发现了一个科威德集群。所有1300万居民现在都被封锁了
這個中國城市發現了一個科威德集羣。所有1300萬居民現在都被封鎖了
